title.value: Overcoming boundaries: Interdisciplinary challenges and opportunities in cognitive neuroscience
title.justification: This title is directly taken from the paper's header.
title.quote: Overcoming boundaries: Interdisciplinary challenges and opportunities in cognitive neuroscience

extractions.description: The paper discusses the potential of cognitive neuroscience to translate understanding of brain function into practical applications. It highlights interdisciplinary projects as case studies to demonstrate challenges and opportunities in the field. The focus is on understanding human cognition through collaborative efforts across different disciplines.

type.justification: The paper focuses on the theoretical discussion of interdisciplinary challenges in cognitive neuroscience, rather than presenting new empirical research.
type.quote: Our approach is to study research questions of mutual interest in the contexts of domain-specific applications, using (and sometimes improving) the experimental tools and techniques of cognitive neuroscience.

name.justification: The primary focus of the paper is on the field of cognitive neuroscience, discussing its potential and challenges in interdisciplinary applications.
name.quote: Cognitive neuroscience has considerable untapped potential to translate our understanding of brain function into applications that maintain, restore, or enhance human cognition.

name.justification: The paper is published in the journal Neuropsychologia, indicating a focus on neuropsychology as a subfield.
The paper discusses interdisciplinary challenges and opportunities in cognitive neuroscience.
name.quote: Our cognitive neuroscience team has been collaborating on several interdisciplinary projects...
